citations.title: BYD DOLPHIN: Agile and Versatile
citations.summary: The BYD Dolphin features a DC charging time of 29 minutes to charge from 30% to 80% and includes a standard heat pump and Vehicle-to-Load (V2L) function, enabling 3.3kW external discharge for use as a mobile power station. Its integrated system, comprising the Distribution Unit, Drive Motor, Motor Controller, Transmission, DC-DC converter, and On-Board Charger, achieves an impressive efficiency of 89%. This combination of features enhances the vehicle's versatility for various lifestyle applications, such as outdoor activities.

citations.title: BYD DOLPHIN: Agile and Versatile
citations.summary: The BYD DOLPHIN features a high-efficiency integrated heat pump that serves as the industry's first direct cooling and heating system for power batteries, enhancing thermal efficiency by up to 15% in winter conditions. This system utilizes residual heat from various sources, including the surroundings and powertrain, and operates effectively across a wide temperature range. Additionally, the top variants include a panoramic sunroof with high-strength acoustic and thermally insulated double-layer glazing, providing an expansive view and effective sun shading.

citations.title: BYD SEAL: Dynamic and Intelligent
citations.summary: The BYD SEAL features a high-efficiency heat pump system that operates effectively across a temperature range of -30°C to 60°C, enabling efficient battery temperature regulation and passenger compartment climate control with low energy consumption. This system can utilize waste heat from the electric powertrain and includes advanced seat functions, such as ventilation and heating for front seats, tailored to various climates. Additionally, the vehicle supports charging at 150kW DC and 11kW AC (3 phase), enhancing its usability and convenience.

citations.title: BYD SEAL: Dynamic and Intelligent
citations.summary: The BYD SEAL features a high-efficiency heat pump system capable of operating in a wide temperature range from -30°C to 60°C, allowing for effective battery temperature regulation and passenger compartment climate control with minimal energy consumption. Additionally, the vehicle employs CTB technology, which integrates the battery pack's top cover with the body floor structure, enhancing volume utilization by 66% and increasing energy density by 10%.

citations.title: The All-New BYD ATTO 3 Debuts in the UK
citations.summary: The BYD ATTO 3, utilizing the e-Platform 3.0, features the BYD Blade Battery and a high-efficiency heat pump that incorporates the industry's first direct cooling and heating system for power batteries, enhancing thermal efficiency by up to 20% in winter. This innovative thermal management system ensures optimal performance across various temperatures, while the lithium iron phosphate (LFP) battery offers superior safety, thermal stability, and durability, achieving an overall system efficiency of 89%. Additionally, the LFP battery is notable for being cobalt-free.

citations.title: BYD SEAL arrives in Europe Setting the Standard ...
citations.summary: The BYD SEAL features a high-efficiency heat pump system that optimizes battery temperature management through direct cooling and heating, while also maintaining passenger comfort with minimal energy use. This system can operate in extreme temperatures from -30°C to 60°C and utilizes waste heat from the electric powertrain. Additionally, the CTB (Cell-to-Body) battery technology enhances the vehicle's structural integrity, achieving a torsional stiffness of 40,500 Nm/degree, which improves handling, comfort, and safety while also optimizing space by integrating the battery directly with the vehicle's body.
